Uses of Interface
edu.rit.pj2.Vbl

  • Packages that use Vbl 
    Package Description
    edu.rit.pj2
    Package edu.rit.pj2 contains Parallel Java 2 (PJ2), an API and middleware for parallel programming in 100% Java on multicore parallel computers, cluster parallel computers, supercomputing grids, and cloud computing services.
    edu.rit.pj2.example
    Package edu.rit.pj2.example contains example programs illustrating how to do parallel programming with the Parallel Java 2 Library.
    edu.rit.pj2.vbl
    Package edu.rit.pj2.vbl contains general-purpose reduction variable classes that implement interface Vbl.
    edu.rit.pjmr
    Package edu.rit.pjmr contains Parallel Java Map Reduce (PJMR), a simple parallel map-reduce framework built on top of Parallel Java 2.

    • Uses of Vbl in edu.rit.pj2

      V      		 LoopBody.threadLocal(V global)

      Get a thread-local copy of the given global shared variable.

    • Uses of Vbl in edu.rit.pj2.vbl

      Classes in edu.rit.pj2.vbl that implement Vbl 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BitSet32Vbl
      Class BitSet32Vbl provides a reduction variable for a set of integers from 0 to 31 shared by multiple threads executing a ParallelStatement.
      static class  BitSet32Vbl.Intersection
      Class BitSet32Vbl.Intersection provides a reduction variable for a set of integers from 0 to 31, where the reduction operation is set intersection.
      static class  BitSet32Vbl.MaxSize
      Class BitSet32Vbl.MaxSize provides a reduction variable for a set of integers from 0 to 31, where the reduction operation is to keep the set with the largest size.
      static class  BitSet32Vbl.MinSize
      Class BitSet32Vbl.MinSize provides a reduction variable for a set of integers from 0 to 31, where the reduction operation is to keep the set with the smallest size.
      static class  BitSet32Vbl.Union
      Class BitSet32Vbl.Union provides a reduction variable for a set of integers from 0 to 31, where the reduction operation is set union.
      class  BitSet64Vbl
      Class BitSet64Vbl provides a reduction variable for a set of integers from 0 to 63 shared by multiple threads executing a ParallelStatement.
      static class  BitSet64Vbl.Intersection
      Class BitSet64Vbl.Intersection provides a reduction variable for a set of integers from 0 to 63, where the reduction operation is set intersection.
      static class  BitSet64Vbl.MaxSize
      Class BitSet64Vbl.MaxSize provides a reduction variable for a set of integers from 0 to 63, where the reduction operation is to keep the set with the largest size.
      static class  BitSet64Vbl.MinSize
      Class BitSet64Vbl.MinSize provides a reduction variable for a set of integers from 0 to 63, where the reduction operation is to keep the set with the smallest size.
      static class  BitSet64Vbl.Union
      Class BitSet64Vbl.Union provides a reduction variable for a set of integers from 0 to 63, where the reduction operation is set union.
      class  BitSetVbl
      Class BitSetVbl provides a reduction variable for a set of integers from 0 to a given upper bound shared by multiple threads executing a ParallelStatement.
      static class  BitSetVbl.Intersection
      Class BitSetVbl.Intersection provides a reduction variable for a set of integers from 0 to a given upper bound, where the reduction operation is set intersection.
      static class  BitSetVbl.MaxSize
      Class BitSetVbl.MaxSize provides a reduction variable for a set of integers from 0 to a given upper bound, where the reduction operation is to keep the set with the largest size.
      static class  BitSetVbl.MinSize
      Class BitSetVbl.MinSize provides a reduction variable for a set of integers from 0 to a given upper bound, where the reduction operation is to keep the set with the smallest size.
      static class  BitSetVbl.Union
      Class BitSetVbl.Union provides a reduction variable for a set of integers from 0 to a given upper bound, where the reduction operation is set union.
      class  BooleanVbl
      Class BooleanVbl provides a Boolean reduction variable shared by multiple threads executing a ParallelStatement.
      static class  BooleanVbl.And
      Class BooleanVbl.And provides a Boolean reduction variable, with Boolean and as the reduction operation.
      static class  BooleanVbl.Or
      Class BooleanVbl.Or provides a Boolean reduction variable, with Boolean or as the reduction operation.
      static class  BooleanVbl.Xor
      Class BooleanVbl.Xor provides a Boolean reduction variable, with Boolean exclusive-or as the reduction operation.
      class  ByteVbl
      Class ByteVbl provides a byte reduction variable shared by multiple threads executing a ParallelStatement.
      static class  ByteVbl.And
      Class ByteVbl.And provides a byte reduction variable, with bitwise Boolean and as the reduction operation.
      static class  ByteVbl.Max
      Class ByteVbl.Max provides a byte reduction variable, with maximum as the reduction operation.
      static class  ByteVbl.Min
      Class ByteVbl.Min provides a byte reduction variable, with minimum as the reduction operation.
      static class  ByteVbl.Or
      Class ByteVbl.Or provides a byte reduction variable, with bitwise Boolean or as the reduction operation.
      static class  ByteVbl.Sum
      Class ByteVbl.Sum provides a byte reduction variable, with addition as the reduction operation.
      static class  ByteVbl.Xor
      Class ByteVbl.Xor provides a byte reduction variable, with bitwise Boolean exclusive-or as the reduction operation.
      class  CharVbl
      Class CharVbl provides a character reduction variable shared by multiple threads executing a ParallelStatement.
      class  DoubleHistogramVbl
      Class DoubleHistogramVbl is the abstract base class for a histogram that categorizes values of type double into bins and counts the number of occurrences in each bin.
      class  DoubleVbl
      Class DoubleVbl provides a double precision floating point reduction variable shared by multiple threads executing a ParallelStatement.

      Class FloatHistogramVbl is the abstract base class for a histogram that categorizes values of type float into bins and counts the number of occurrences in each bin.

    • Uses of Vbl in edu.rit.pjmr

      Classes in edu.rit.pjmr with type parameters of type Vbl 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Combiner<K,V extends Vbl>
      Class Combiner provides a combiner in the Parallel Java Map Reduce Framework.
      class  Customizer<K,V extends Vbl>
      Class Customizer is the base class for a customizer in the Parallel Java Map Reduce Framework.
      class  Mapper<IK,IV,OK,OV extends Vbl>
      Class Mapper is the abstract base class for a mapper in the Parallel Java Map Reduce Framework.
      class  MapperConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV extends Vbl>
      Class MapperConfig contains specifications for configuring a Mapper in a mapper task.
      class  MapperTask<IK,IV,OK,OV extends Vbl>
      Class MapperTask provides a mapper task in the Parallel Java Map Reduce Framework.
      class  MapperTaskConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV extends Vbl>
      Class MapperTaskConfig contains specifications for configuring a mapper task.
      class  PjmrJob<IK,IV,OK,OV extends Vbl>
      Class PjmrJob is the abstract base class for a map-reduce job in the Parallel Java Map Reduce Framework.
      class  Reducer<K,V extends Vbl>
      Class Reducer is the abstract base class for a reducer in the Parallel Java Map Reduce Framework.
      class  ReducerConfig<K,V extends Vbl>
      Class ReducerConfig contains specifications for configuring a Reducer in a reducer task.
      class  ReducerTask<K,V extends Vbl>
      Class ReducerTask provides a reducer task in the Parallel Java Map Reduce Framework.
      class  ReducerTaskConfig<K,V extends Vbl>
      Class ReducerTaskConfig contains specifications for configuring a reducer task.
      class  SourceConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV extends Vbl>
      Class SourceConfig contains specifications for configuring a Source in a mapper task.
